public void playerMenu() { sendQuest("@dre@~The SawScape Rules~", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@cya@-- SawScape Terms Of User --", 8145); sendQuest("@dbl@Read These Rule Carefully", 8146); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8147); sendQuest("@dbl@1)No Asking for Mod/Admin", 8148); sendQuest("@dbl@2)No ::noclip", 8149); sendQuest("@dbl@3)No Massing", 8150); sendQuest("@dbl@4)Have Respect Against Other Players", 8151); sendQuest("@dbl@5)Listen What Mods/Admins say to you", 8152); sendQuest("@dbl@6)Breaking this rules will result into Warn-Kick-Temp Muted-Ban-IpBan", 8153); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8154); sendQuest("@dbl@Pk Rules", 8155); sendQuest("@dbl@1)No white\black armor pking.", 8156); sendQuest("@dbl@2)No 0 item,1 item, 2 item pking. you need 3 items minimum.", 8157); sendQuest("@dbl@3)No killing People who are Training", 8158); sendQuest("@dbl@4)No 'perfect' item pking what so ever", 8159); sendQuest("@dbl@5)No ::noclip to get an advantage.", 8160); sendQuest("@dbl@6)No mass clicking When pking", 8162); sendQuest("@dbl@Breaking this rules will result into Warn-Kick-Ban-IpBan", 8163); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8164); sendQuest("@dbl@If you See Mods/Admins abusing Their power", 8165); sendQuest("@dbl@ScreenShot Him/Her When you get a chance too then show it too Greenspirit", 8166); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8167); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8168); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8169); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8170); sendQuest("@dbl@Thank You For Reading The Rules", 8171); sendQuest("@dbl@-Greenspirit", 8172); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
